name: Platformer (Sprotex)
description:
Controls

Move rectangle with A/D or left/right arrow keys, jump with W/Space/up arrow. Mobile move rectangle width touching left or right side of the screen, jump with upper half of the screen. Move through levels (both of them) to restart at the beginning. :) The game has no loading screen, but is fairly small (~4 MB), please be patient.

After seeing the blazing speeds of web export of Godot game engine, I've decided to switch from Unity to it. This is the second game of several that I've planned out, mostly trying to learn the engine and not to develop something very serious.
